overview:
Avista Partners is an independent investment banking firm focusing on the digital media and luxury & lifestyle industries. We bring deep sector expertise, global relationships, and world class transaction experience. Our global network is based on strong relationships with founders and senior management, as well as investors including venture capitalists, private equity firms, hedge funds, family offices and institutional investors.

Our team understands media and luxury companies and investors, and we develop customised solutions to meet client objectives. The Avista Partners model prioritizes trust, professionalism and integrity. By leveraging our deep understanding of our clients’ industry dynamics and specific circumstances, we feel we can more readily address with our clients’ needs and help realize their strategic goals.
